医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，每日服用阿司匹林与老年人死亡率较高有关ASPREE 临床试验的一项研究发现，70 岁以上的成年人每天摄入阿司匹林并不会增加无残疾生存率，而且会导致较高的全因死亡率，主要是由于癌症相关的死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Daily-aspirin-linked-to-higher-mortality-in-older-adults-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Daily-aspirin-linked-to-higher-mortality-in-older-adults-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ca886ea-e598-49ee-a9cf-66c8847eaf70 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 19:18:00 -0500 Daily aspirin linked to higher mortality in older adults, study finds
在代谢综合征研究中，蓝莓可以促进平静，但不能提高认知能力《美国临床营养学杂志》上的一项研究发现，长期摄入蓝莓并不能显着改善患有代谢综合征的成年人的认知功能、警觉性或情绪，尽管在高脂肪、高糖餐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Blueberry-boost-calmness-but-not-cognition-in-metabolic-syndrome-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Blueberry-boost-calmness-but-not-cognition-in-metabolic-syndrome-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a428d7e3-982d-428f-8b8b-48a86ba457de Mon, 12 Feb 2024 19:02:00 -0500 Blueberries boost calmness but not cognition in metabolic syndrome study
橄榄油对抗阿尔茨海默氏症的秘密武器：酚类化合物《国际分子科学杂志》上的一篇综合评论强调了特级初榨橄榄油及其酚类化合物通过各种机制预防和治疗阿尔茨海默病的潜力，包括减少淀粉样蛋白积累和神经炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Olive-oils-secret-weapon-against-Alzheimers-phenolic-compounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Olive-oils-secret-weapon-against-Alzheimers-phenolic-compounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6511644f-c178-412c-b563-b852ef070d91 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 18:28:00 -0500 Olive oil's secret weapon against Alzheimer's: phenolic compounds
研究发现左右转弯所需的复杂神经网络中缺失的部分你有没有想过当我们向右或向左移动时大脑会发生什么？大多数人不这么认为；他们只是不假思索地去做。但这个简单的动作实际上是由一个复杂的过程控制的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-uncovers-missing-piece-in-the-complex-nerve-network-needed-for-left-right-turns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-uncovers-missing-piece-in-the-complex-nerve-network-needed-for-left-right-turns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7844e154-aef6-45a6-bb06-8b5b0d5b27d6 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 14:33:13 -0500 Study uncovers missing piece in the complex nerve-network needed for left-right turns
通过标准血液测试可以预测心脏病发作使用标准血液测试和在线工具的结果，您可以确定您在六个月内心脏病发作的风险是否增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Heart-attacks-can-be-predicted-with-a-standard-blood-test.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Heart-attacks-can-be-predicted-with-a-standard-blood-test.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06dbbe92-36bc-4fa6-be4d-32b9a3d704ea Mon, 12 Feb 2024 14:23:00 -0500 Heart attacks can be predicted with a standard blood test
研究揭示了癌细胞采用的关键生存策略洛桑联邦理工学院 Didier Trono 团队领导的一项研究揭示了癌细胞采用的一种至关重要的生存策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-reveals-a-crucial-survival-tropic-owned-by-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-reveals-a-crucial-survival-tropic-owned-by-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9ca49b3-29f7-426e-ae97-6573187d29d1 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 14:18:33 -0500 Study reveals a crucial survival tactic employed by cancer cells
研究人员发现肠道干细胞的营养适应与衰老之间的新作用机制肠道干细胞维持肠道细胞平衡的能力随着年龄的增长而下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Researchers-uncover-new-mechanism-of-action- Between- Nutrition-adaptation-of-intestinal-stem-cells-and-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Researchers-uncover-new-mechanism-of-action- Between-nutrition-adaptation-of-intestinal-stem-cells-and-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2406e6fd-cfe0-4701-a47b-e91dc8a0ca6b Mon, 12 Feb 2024 14:10:36 -0500 Researchers uncover new mechanism of action between nutrient adaptation of intestinal stem cells and aging
关于儿科长期新冠症状的新综合报告发布美国有多达 580 万儿童和青少年出现过 COVID-19 症状，这些症状在初次感染后仍持续很长时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/New-compressive-report-on-pediatric-long-COVID-symptoms-published.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/New-compressive-report-on-pediatric-long-COVID-symptoms-published.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=feb66f16-f142-48a1-8094-55fae5295d36 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 14:05:51 -0500 New comprehensive report on pediatric long COVID symptoms published
研究可能开辟治疗代谢疾病的新方法巴塞罗那大学和糖尿病及相关代谢紊乱生物医学研究网络中心 (CIBERDEM) 领导的一项研究揭示了一种新机制如何提高目前糖尿病治疗的效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-may-open-up-new-ways-of-approaching-metabolic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-may-open-up-new-ways-of-approaching-metabolic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40bf9cb5-f47e-4f9e-8e9e-119ddb139241 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 13:54:00 -0500 Study may open up new ways of approaching metabolic diseases
新方法通过姐妹细胞追踪癌症的引发耐药性在许多癌症中，例如卵巢癌，每轮化疗都会杀死大多数癌细胞，而其中一小部分癌细胞可以通过治疗存活下来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/New-method-traces-primed-resistance-in-cancer-via-sister-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/New-method-traces-primed-resistance-in-cancer-via-sister-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55fb5497-faf3-4c94-ad45-943e6cf297ab Mon, 12 Feb 2024 13:32:17 -0500 New method traces primed resistance in cancer via sister cells
